entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 23. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early this evening. Low minus 23. Wind chill minus 18 this evening and minus 31 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Sunday 2 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 9. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 31 in the morning and minus 14 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Sunday 2 April 2023
